channel.title: Projects on inspiral | Tom Verdonck
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on inspiral | Tom Verdonck

item.title: CAN2.0 dongle
item.description: This dongle can be used in combination with a certain brand of material handling equipment. When connected to the CAN-bus it unlocks menus for diagnostic purposes. Features: ARM Cortex-M0 microcontroller CAN2.

item.title: I/O card
item.description: (*) The image has been pixelated per client request. This I/O card can be mounted in a standard PC and uses a simple USB2.0 interface for control. Multiple cards can be daisy-chained to increase the I/O capabilities of the system.

item.title: Standalone tester
item.description: Standalone tester for programming and testing an IO interface board. Programming + full coverage test takes 10 seconds. Features: Custom fixture with needle bed. Broadcom BCM2835 processor HDMI diplay USB Atmel ICE programmer USB RS485 serial communication.
